name: Organizational Innovation and Digital Leadership (DEM)
description: This course investigates innovation strategies in organizations, including characteristics of knowledge intensive firms, open innovation, leading in digital age, design thinking in innovation process with a special emphasis on how they apply to dispersed teams. In addition, other organization in digital age issues will be discussed such as multicultural work place and cohesion, cross-cultural competencies both from a diversity and globalization standpoint. [24L]
